channel.title: Some Royal Crossbow information for those interested
channel.description:
Yes, its a video.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vt6wSMj2K6Y
Just to sum it up: -Costs ~20M, 5M each part. -Highest accuracy crossbow in the game -Damage starts in the 40s-60s, escalates to 100s-120s after 9 shots fired -Does not work well in PvP or at Corp -Degrades fully after 20 hours in combat -Unknown as to what happens after it reaches 0% -Can only fire Royal Bolts -Every hit causes 2 more bleed damage hits, each about 8 seconds apart (first 8 seconds after the initial hit, second 8 seconds after the first bleed hit) -If no shots are fired after the 2nd bleed hit of the most recent shot fired, the damage will reset back to the 40-60s range -I somehow managed to hit a 321, likely a glitch though :rolleyes:
So yeah. Thats pretty much it. Thought some of you would appreciate the information :)

[quote=“Decimus, post:3, topic:443937”]your kills are only fast because you’re using Nips. :P[/quote]I always used 2 or 3 dreadnips with Polypore and Gano

item.title: Some Royal Crossbow information for those interested
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Yes, its a video.

Just to sum it up:
-Costs ~20M, 5M each part.
-Highest accuracy crossbow in the game
-Damage starts in the 40s-60s, escalates to 100s-120s after 9 shots fired
-Does not work well in PvP or at Corp
-Degrades fully after 20 hours in combat
-Unknown as to what happens after it reaches 0%
-Can only fire Royal Bolts
-Every hit causes 2 more bleed damage hits, each about 8 seconds apart (first 8 seconds after the initial hit, second 8 seconds after the first bleed hit)
-If no shots are fired after the 2nd bleed hit of the most recent shot fired, the damage will reset back to the 40-60s range
-I somehow managed to hit a 321, likely a glitch though :rolleyes:

So yeah. Thats pretty much it. Thought some of you would appreciate the information

Read full topic
item.source: Some Royal Crossbow information for those interested
